My company is in the process of developing a NEAT accelerator. This 
would =
be a combination of hardware and software that accelerates the 
process of =
evolving a population of networks for a particular NEAT 
application.

We a=
nticipate a 20 fold reduction in training time compared to a 
system runnin=
g on a single CPU Dual Core Pentium system. But this 
would of course depen=
d greatly upon the problem at hand.

The product will consist of an API wri=
tten in C that will interface 
with a hardware system and accelerate the co=
re functionality of the 
NEAT algorithm.

A feature set and pricing model h=
as not been finalized.  Though to 
make the product financially viable a te=
ntative price of $10K USD has 
been estimated.

The reason I am posting is =
to gauge interest. If you or your company 
would be interested in this prod=
uct please send me an e-mail to: 
ShaneR at RyanCapital dot EU. Additionall=
y if you have any questions 
or concerns please e-mail me or post on this f=
orum and will try and 
answer them as quickly as possible.

Thank you,

Sha=
